The trial protocol stipulates ONC201 at a dose of 625 mg administered orally twice weekly (Monday and Thursday) throughout the radiation course and for a planned total duration of 12 months.

The patient’s clinical status also improved, with regained ability to ambulate short distances and a reduction in dysphagia.
